Controls

Begin by clicking on the image window!

  • Move the Camera: WASD
  • Rotate/Look Around: Use your mouse or the arrow keys
  • Pause: Press P
  • Exit the Image Window: Press escape
  • Place a Cube: Left click
  • Delete a Cube: Right click
  • Change Cube Color: Use the color picker in the top right
  • Make Raytraced Image (EXPERIMENTAL!!!): Press R
